name: HighsDynamicRowMatrix
brief:
Dynamic row matrix with efficient column-sign iteration

Sparse row-wise matrix supporting efficient row add/remove with
separate iteration over positive and negative column entries.

**Row Storage:**
- ARrange_[row]: (start, end) range in ARindex_/ARvalue_
- ARindex_[]/ARvalue_[]: Column indices and values
- ARrowindex_[]: Row index for each nonzero position

**Column Iteration by Sign:**
Separate doubly-linked lists for positive and negative entries:
- AheadPos_[col], AnextPos_[], AprevPos_[]: Positive entry list
- AheadNeg_[col], AnextNeg_[], AprevNeg_[]: Negative entry list

**Template Iterators:**
- forEachPositiveColumnEntry(): Iterate positive entries in column
- forEachNegativeColumnEntry(): Iterate negative entries in column
- Useful for implication detection (sign determines bound type)

**Dynamic Operations:**
- addRow(): Insert row, reusing deleted space from freespaces_ set
- removeRow(): Remove row, add index to deletedrows_ for reuse
- unlinkColumns(): Disconnect row from column lists
see: mip/HighsDomain.h for domain propagation using sign iteration
mip/HighsCutPool.h for similar dynamic cut storage
